Package com.bewsoftware.utils.string

Class Diff.ModifiedLine

java.lang.Object
com.bewsoftware.utils.string.Diff.ModifiedLine
Enclosing class:
Diff
public static class Diff.ModifiedLine extends Object
This is an immutable class that holds the line text and attributes recorded for each pair of lines that are different.

  • Field Summary

    Field

    final int

    The line number within the original text file.

    The original unmodified line text.
    final int
    position
    The first character position within the original text that is different from the modified version of the text.
